head.title: Java Document Merging API | merge & remove Word Excel PDF XPS EPUB
head.description: Documents merging API for Java. Merge, split, swap, reorder and delete pages of PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, presentations, Visio, XPS & EPUB formats.

header.title: Java API to Combine & Split Documents
header.description: Develop high-performance apps that can combine, rip, shuffle, cut or delete pages, slides and diagrams on the go.

content.paragraph_1: GroupDocs.Merger for Java makes you able to quickly develop top-line business applications in Java. With little coding your Java applications can merge, rip, shuffle, cut and delete single page or batch of pages, slides and diagrams. Merging operations can also be performed on secure files of known and unknown format by applying or removing password protection.

tab_one.description: Following is an overview of GroupDocs.Merger for Java:

content.line_4: Swap or shuffle any two pages

tab_two.description: GroupDocs.Merger for Java supports merging the following [document file formats](https://docs.groupdocs.com/merger/java/supported-document-formats/):

content.line_1: **Word:** DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM, RTF, TXT
content.line_2: **Excel:** XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB, XLTM, XLT, XLTM, XLTX, XLAM, SXC, SpreadsheetML
content.line_3: **PowerPoint:** PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, PPSM, POT, POTM, POTX, PPTM

content.line_1: **OpenDocument Formats**: ODT, OTT, ODP, OTP, ODS

tab_three.description: GroupDocs.Merger for Java supports following Operating Systems, Frameworks & Package Managers:

feature_1.content: Merge various pages, slides & diagrams into a single file

feature_2.content: Rip & split huge documents into multiple smaller files

feature_3.content: Shuffle & reorganize pages, slides or diagrams

feature_4.content: Exchange & swap two pages, slides or diagrams among each other within a document

feature_5.content: Cut & trim document by removing specific pages, slides or diagrams

feature_6.content: Delete single or collection of pages, slides or diagrams

feature_7.content: Stitch & merge together a large number of documents in batches

feature_8.content: Programmatically check in Java if a document is secured with a password

feature_9.content: Set, reset and remove password of known and unknown document formats

feature_10.content: Split One Text File to Multiple by Line Numbers

feature_11.content: Get Image Representation of Document Pages

feature_12.content: Merge Multiple Documents of Different Formats to a Single PDF File

feature_13.content: Insert OLE Objects into PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint & Open Document Formats

feature_14.content: Programmatically Attach Files to A PDF Document

feature_15.content: Add Document to Diagram via OLE Objects

feature_16.content: Merge Different Types of Documents (DOC, XLS, PPT etc) into A Single PDF File

feature_17.content: Easily Import OLE Objects into Microsoft Word, Excel, Presentation and OpenDocument File Types

feature_18.content: Add Other Documents to Diagram Page via OLE Objects

feature_1.title: Remove Desired Pages from Documents
feature_1.content: GroupDocs.Merger for Java API lets you select and delete unwanted pages from your document.

feature_2.title: Check Password of Unknown Document Format
feature_2.content: Even if the format of a particular document is unknown, GroupDocs.Merger for Java enables you to check & retrieve document password, if available.

feature_3.title: Join Password-Protected Documents of Known Formats
feature_3.content: GroupDocs.Merger for Java API allows you to get a list of documents of known and unknown formats.

solutions.title: GroupDocs.Merger offers document merging APIs for other popular development environments
